title: Mission: Impossible
description: Based on the hit T.V. series. Jim Phelps was sent to Prague for a mission to prevent the theft of classified material. His wife Claire and his trusted partner Ethan Hunt were members of Phelps' team. Unfortunately, something went horribly wrong and the mission failed, leaving Ethan Hunt the lone survivor. After he reported the failed mission, Kettridge the head of the agency suspects Ethan of being the culprit for the failed mission. Now, Ethan uses unorthodox methods (Which includes the aid of an arms dealer going by the name "Max") to try to find who set him up and to clear his name. Written by John Wiggins
castList: [Tom Cruise, Jon Voight, Emmanuelle Béart, Henry Czerny, Jean Reno, Ving Rhames, Kristin Scott Thomas, Vanessa Redgrave, Ingeborga Dapkunaite, Valentina Yakunina, Marek Vasut, Nathan Osgood, John McLaughlin, Rolf Saxon, Karel Dobrý]
characterList: [Ethan Hunt, Jim Phelps, Claire Phelps (as Emmanuelle Beart), Eugene Kittridge, Franz Krieger, Luther Stickell, Sarah Davies (as Kristin Scott-Thomas), Max, Hannah Williams, Drunken Female IMF Agent, Drunken Male IMF Agent, Kittridge Technician, TV Interviewer, CIA Analyst William Donloe, Matthias]
